Detailed Description

IO-stream maipulator for formatted time printing.

Uses strftime for the actual formatting.

Definition at line 391 of file STLUtility.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

STLUtility::printTime::printTime (  time_t  time,
const MC2String  format = "%FT%T%z"
)  [inline]
 

Constructor.

Parameters:
time The time_t value that should be printed according to the format specifier.
format The strftime format that should be used. Default value is "%+" which is "The date and time in date(1) format.".
